needs: Seeking contract accounting roles supporting a CFO/Controller in London where measurable outcomes and faster financial operations are priorities. Immediate objectives: shorten month‑end close, strengthen controls to recover losses, instrument KPIs and SLOs, and establish transparent governance and auditability within the first 90 days while operating across functions under tight timelines.
personality: Analytical, systems‑oriented communicator who surfaces unknowns early through probes and short experiments. Prefers lightweight artifacts—decision logs, runbooks, demos—and data‑driven iteration. Values ownership, inclusion, reliability, and humane processes. Mentors through pairing and concise documentation, balances risk mapping with pragmatic, measurable milestones to turn ambiguity into reliable outcomes.
